Description: Recruitment Opportunity with Management Solutions International (MSI) Skills
Skills: Facilitation skills (for conducting workshops and interviews).
Sufficient management skills to coordinate the work of this team.
Advanced user of Primavera P6 and MS Excel.
Comprehensive understanding of WBS, CBS, OBS and other project coding structures.
Sufficient knowledge of the disciplines of cost controlling, scheduling, risk management, change management and their interlinkages.
Sufficient understanding of commercial and contractual aspects and constraints.
Understanding of IT systems setup and implementation.
Sufficient industry experience (petrochemicals) to understand the drivers of petrochemical projects, including track record of site delegations.
